description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Plunder the universe in a never ending quest for better loot and harder challenges. Engage entire worlds with up to four other players. Prestige mode lets you play forever as your enemies scale with your progress.
description.short: Plunder the universe in a never ending quest for better loot and harder challenges. Engage entire worlds with up to four other players. Prestige mode lets you play forever as your enemies scale with your progress.
